lead_paragraph: Sturm, the world super middleweight champion, announced that he had tested positive for an anabolic steroid after his win over Fedor Chudinov on Feb. 20.

headline.print_headline: Champion Sturm Tests Positive for Steroid
headline.main: Champion Felix Sturm Tests Positive for Steroid

snippet: Sturm, the world super middleweight champion, announced that he had tested positive for an anabolic steroid after his win over Fedor Chudinov on Feb. 20.
